channel.title: life on Blommaerts Edwin
channel.description: Recent content in life on Blommaerts Edwin

item.title: Pancakes (With honey and sliced apples)
item.description: Extra dad points for me today, managed to speed-cook pancakes with honey and sliced apples. All within the time I have allowed myself to pick her up from school and then make her a snack. Happy kid, happy life.

item.title: Poppedecorn!
item.description: Today I introduced my daughter to the popcorn song! We both danced, we put it on repeat, slammed a bag of popcorn in the microwave, and danced some more. She’s now eaten a small bowl of popcorn. I love my life and my daughter. I ended it with a METAL VERSION!!!!! \m/

item.title: Live review: Lord Of The Lost, 23-09-23, London, UK
item.description: After a long train journey in which I drained my phone battery to about 36%, I arrived about an hour early at the O2 Shepherd’s Bush Empire venue and was surprised to find a sloppy long winding queue in an alley down the side of the building. With some difficulty, I was able to find where I could join in. The weather was crisp but not cold and there was a nice atmosphere.

item.title: New Year!
item.description: Welcome to the new year. Let’s create a new list. Keep running, and initially run more than I did last year. Looking at the stats on Strava that would mean running more than 292.3 km, which shouldn’t be hard to do. If I succeed with that I’ll try and go for 1000km for 2024. Write about my experience going through this journey. Last year’s (2023) stats: Activities 56 Distance 292.

item.title: Almost the new year
item.description: Well, what a year this has been. My daughter turned six. I can’t believe how fast she’s growing. I can still vividly remember being able to hold her in one arm, the palm of my hand cradling her little head. Now she’s putting on children’s makeup and talking about boys that kissed her. I’m now also single. I didn’t see that one coming at the start of the year, but here we are.
